definition: to lean on/to rest against/to rely on/support/backing/back of a chair
to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

sentences.english: The men alternated leading and lying on their backs and kicking.
sentences.chinese: 所有人輪流領遊和倚靠在別人背上蹬劃。

sentences.english: Confidence in an unfaithful man in time of trouble is like a broken tooth, and a foot out of joint.
sentences.chinese: 患難時倚靠不忠誠的人，好像破壞的牙，錯骨縫的腳。

sentences.english: Such is Pharaoh king of Egypt to all who depend on him.
sentences.chinese: 埃及王法老向一切倚靠他的人也是這樣。

sentences.english: With the sword they will destroy the fortified cities in which you trust.
sentences.chinese: 又必用刀毀壞你所倚靠的堅固城。

sentences.english: God wants us to surrender all of these for complete dependence on Him.
sentences.chinese: 上帝要我們放棄這些世俗的東西，完全倚靠祂。

sentences.english: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 當獻上公義的祭，又當倚靠耶和華。

sentences.english: 2in you I trust, O my God.
sentences.chinese: 我的神阿，我素來倚靠你。

sentences.english: And we’ll see how to address reality with faith.
sentences.chinese: 我們也要來看看如何憑信心倚靠神，面對現實。

sentences.english: BirdLife's network representatives are therefore relying on local sources to receive updates.
sentences.chinese: 國際鳥盟聯絡代表因此倚靠當地消息來更新信息。

sentences.english: I will trust and not be afraid.
I loved leaning over the bow just gazing at the shape and colours and – when in the Zodiac – peering down through the translucent water to try to make out the bases of the bergs.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡依倚靠在船頭上，注視着各種形狀和顏色的冰。

sentences.english: We are approaching Xinjekou Station , pls stand clear from the train doors.
sentences.chinese: 新街口站到了，請不要倚靠車門，注意安全。

sentences.english: The invalid lay propped on the pillows.
sentences.chinese: 那病弱者倚靠在枕頭上。

sentences.english: She closes her eyes and leans back on the mangoes' bark.
sentences.chinese: 她閉上眼睛，倚靠在芒果樹的枝幹上。

sentences.english: So Ben butchers in the past rely on the straw heap below, pick up the butcher's knife lay down their burden.
sentences.chinese: 屠戶於是奔過去倚靠在柴草堆下，放下擔子拿起屠刀。

sentences.english: A feral sweet pea clings to it for support.
sentences.chinese: 一株野生的甜豌豆攀附而上，倚靠着它。

definition: to rely on/to be dependent on
to look up at/to look up to sb hopefully
to be right next to/to lean closely against
to nestle against/to snuggle up to
to adhere/to attach oneself to/to append
